name: exaspera
description:
exaspera is a short prototype made in a week which is mainly my experimentation with a surreal atmosphere, or figuring out how to make a kit filled with seemingly unrelated assets work together in an interesting way. If it was about anything (and I'm not sure it is) it'd be about being a fish (spaceship?) in space or about being angry at capitalism or somewhere in between those two.

Controls:

  • Look around - Mouse
  • Move forward - W
  • Interact - Space
  • Esc - Quit
